pages.text: Fontis reserved deus servus; it gush out prout they testimentum
They fulfill their pledges reverence feria est extremely difficult
They donate their favorite food poor orphanus captive
Nos feed vos DEUS; nos non expect reward vos nor thanks
Nos fear noster Dominus feria est foderator de misery trouble
Consequently DEUS protects them malus ut feria rewards them joy contentment
He rewards them pro their steadfastness Paradise silk
They relax therein luxurious furnishings. They suffer nec heat sun nor any cold
shade covers them therein fruits brought intra reach
They served drinks silver containers cups ut est translucent
Translucent cups though factus silver they rightly deserved totus hoc
They enjoy drinks delicious flavors
Ex fontis therein known Salsabeel
Serving them est immortal servus. When vos vide them they look scattered pearls
Wherever vos look vos vide bliss wonderful dominion
On them est clothes de green velvet satin silver ornaments Their Dominus provisus them pure drinks
Hoc est reward awaits vos tuus efforts appreciated
Nos revealed vos hoc Quran; special revelation ex nos
Vos steadfastly carry tuus Dominus commandments non obey any sinful disbeliever them
Ac commemorate cognomen tuus Dominus feria ac nox
